title: Crypto Funds Attract Largest Weekly Inflow in 2023 as Bitcoin 'Short-Sellers Capitulate': CoinShares
description: Crypto investment funds last week attracted their largest inflow this year, extending their strongest run since the 2021 bull market as anticipation for a spot bitcoin [BTC] exchange-traded fund (ETF) continued to entice investors.

title: Justin Sun defends Tron following allegations of facilitating terror financing
description:
Justin Sun, founder of the Tron (TRX) blockchain, has defended the network in a Nov. 27 X (formerly Twitter) post following a Reuters report that it is increasingly being used to finance terrorist activities and organizations. Sun stressed that Tron’s decentralized structure, similar to Bitcoin (BTC) and Ethereum (ETH), forms the core of its philosophy. […]

The post Justin Sun defends Tron following allegations of facilitating terror financing appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Crypto Sees Largest Fund Inflows Since 2021 Amid Bitcoin ETF Expectations
description: Digital asset inflows hit $346M, the highest since late 2021, led by $312M for Bitcoin.

description: In a significant leadership shift on 21 November 2023, Changpeng Zhao (CZ), co-founder of Binance, stepped down as CEO, passing the reins to Richard Teng. title: Crypto Industry and Regulations in Greece: Complexities and Opportunities
description: The cryptocurrency landscape in Greece represents a fascinating amalgamation of innovation, economic dynamics, and evolving regulatory approaches. In the heart of Southeast Europe, Greece’s crypto market has gradually emerged as a significant player, reflecting a broader global trend toward digital currencies. The inception of this market can be traced back to the early 2010s, coinciding ... Read more

title: Putin Unveils Plans for Russian AI to Counter Western Influence
description: Russian President Vladimir Putin has announced a bold initiative to develop a robust artificial intelligence (AI) model to rival what he perceives as “dangerous” Western technology. Speaking at an AI conference in Moscow, Putin urged the country’s tech sector to establish an advanced AI strategy independent of Western influence, citing concerns about bias in prominent ... title: Bitcoin holder claims hacker stole 139 BTC, paid record $3m in fees
description: A Bitcoin user assumed ownership of hacked funds involved in a record-breaking transaction where miner AntPool received over 83 BTC in fees.
